feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine flexible environment PHP
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine flexible environment PHP

entry.content: Support for TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites, is in General Availability (GA).
entry.summary: We're happy to announce that support for TLS 1.2 and later is now in General Availability. This update also includes a secure set of cipher suites.
entry.title: Feature: TLS 1.2 Support Now Available

entry.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. Update your application settings in the App Engine flexible environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).
entry.summary: Support for TLS 1.1 and earlier is deprecated starting March 2025. Update your App Engine settings to use TLS 1.2 or later.
entry.title: Feature: TLS Support Update

entry.content: Support for the PHP 8.4 runtime is in General Availability (GA).
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce that PHP 8.4 is now generally available for the App Engine flexible environment. This update provides the latest features and improvements for your PHP applications.
entry.title: Feature: PHP 8.4 Runtime Now Available
